## perpendicularCCW variable

2D only. Produces a perpendicular vector to `v`<!-- -->, i.e. `[-y,x]`<!-- -->. Assumes positive Y-up.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
perpendicularCCW: VecOpV
```
